page.title: 11LOW FLYING JETS, CHELMARSH
page.content: The aircraft that come over Chelmarsh are sometimes very low.It makes you feel that they are going to land in the playground.The types that come over Hercules,Harriers,Jaguars,F16 fighters and jet bombers.We have recently had an airship,helicopters and crop sprayers. There is an airship called the Goodyear and another called Fuji Film.They are used for advertising and for filming. The low flying aircraft fly low because they want to avoid the radar station on the Clee Hill.They do this as part of an exercise in case there is a real war.We think the pilots use the reservoir as a marker to locate the radar before they pretend to attack it.Unfortunately the school is directly between the two.
